one_reviews_text: Can't tear off my child :) We liked the opportunity to equip the room and paint on the wall)) additional paintbooks are bought separately.. One minus - it's not very clear how to play, at first, but then figured out .. I think developers should pay attention to it .. and so, in overall, very good) add more paintbooks please!)

Double tap A to move. (But tell no one about it!) Follow the dragon from the unity asset store and then listen to some strange meditative stories in between. Bonus: one of the most confusing title/loading screen i have ever seen // Yes, you need definitely a tutorial. Surprising, i know ;)
review_feedback:
Hello :-) Thanks for feedback and we can see the need to make a tutorial!
Yes, we love the dedicated hearts and minds in Unity ;-)

one_reviews_text: I could never figure out how to use the motion controllers.  I was able to use the Oculus Remote, but movement was very difficult.  I finally figured out that if you look down while pressing down and possibly forward on your remote, then you will teleport to the spot.  Everything is controlled by gaze operation.  The story I was able to unlock was well narrated, but it was just a simple Universe VR environment with audio.  Needs more work if they want to make this app good for children to enjoy.
review_feedback: This might be more helpful :-) Currently you can use the oculus remote controller and oculus touch together, or just Oculus remote but only for current levels 1-3. In this update  it is made easier to control - by using only oculus touch without need of using Remote.

one_reviews_text:
It was worth a try for me. Tutorials helpled me getting acknowledged by the gameplay. The moment you start playing it take it to you into another world  and  how you totally get involved in the game is just amazing. Thank you for making it available as free game. 
Big Thanks from game lover.

I used to play randowm VR games but this one caught my atttention when I was just searching for new stuff. Gameplay was cool, graphics are also okay. 
The best thing I loved is the mustery involved in the game. It cotinously keep your focused to make the best strategy. Looking for more updates. 
Hi5 !

When ever I get sad, I used to play games. Painitng is a relief from stress for me. Thanks to my friend reffered me Tjuhej. Now I play all of the day. Oh yes its free.  Looking for more free games like tjuhej. Billion stars from paint lover.

review_title: Decorating with paint is awesome feature
one_reviews_text: Im born artist, and love to play with paint in VR. This is somethign that keep me engaging for hours. I will look for more paint options and effects in next versions.

Well, I love the minigames at the start of each level. Please keep adding more levels in next update. 
Note: I felt like the quality is bit lower than other games. But it has lesser size too. Thats acceptable for my low space harddrive :) 
Im lovin it.
Just bought Rift and it was first game to give a try. Because its free. Love the experience.

Super dooper game. I love it. 
I wish more games like this coming up on Rift.
